snippet: The evolution of Mitt Romney’s stump speech illustrates his long journey from partisanship toward the middle of American politics.
abstract: Political Memo; Mitt Romney takes softer approach in final days of campaign, with no traces of barbs against his Democratic opponent; promises outreach and bipartisan solutions as signature of a Romney presidency.
lead_paragraph: The evolution of Mitt Romney’s stump speech illustrates his long journey from partisanship toward the middle of American politics.

headline.seo: Romney Tones Down Campaign Rhetoric as Vote Nears
headline.main: In Dwindling Days of the Race, Romney Takes a Softer Tack
headline.print_headline: In Dwindling Days of the Race, Romney Takes a Softer Tack
